styles.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif

content.product-description: Enables SME in Designer Mode to create Analytics use cases by creation of Playbook using re-usable Accelerators. For Production Deployment, Application Developers can optimise Playbooks using Developer Mode.
